channel.title: How to a change max stats from 99 to 135?
channel.description: help i dnt want my stats to max at 99 i want every 1 to get 135 stats :confused:

item.title: How to a change max stats from 99 to 135?
item.dc:creator: @I_pwnd_you_all I pwnd you all
item.description:
@I_pwnd_you_all wrote:

[code]public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 135; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
		if (output >= exp) {
			return lvl;
		}
	}
	return 135;
}[/code]

Your’s should be return 99;. Make both return’s to 135, like mine.

Read full topic

1-

return991.jpg775×128

*for number 4 replace the return 99; with 135 and the other

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) { replace that 99 with 135 and you should be done
Now, Just close your client.java save it then go to your compiler and compile it.
